member.name: T:HBOS.FS.AMP.UPD.CustomInstaller.MyEventLogInstaller
member.summary: Custom install event to create the ExceptionManager event log source, as users will not have permissions to do this at runtime.

member.name: M:HBOS.FS.AMP.UPD.CustomInstaller.MyEventLogInstaller.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.summary: Performs the custom installation action to create event log sources.
member.param: An IDictionary used to save information needed to perform a commit, rollback, or uninstall operation.
